android.app
Class StatusBarManager

java.lang.Object
  android.app.StatusBarManager

public class StatusBarManager
extends Object

Allows an app to control the status bar.

Field Summary
static int DISABLE_EXPAND
          Flag for disable(int) to make the status bar not expandable.
static int DISABLE_NONE
          Re-enable all of the status bar features that you've disabled.

Field Detail

DISABLE_EXPAND

public static final int DISABLE_EXPAND
Flag for disable(int) to make the status bar not expandable. Unless you also set #DISABLE_NOTIFICATIONS, new notifications will continue to show.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DISABLE_NOTIFICATION_ICONS

public static final int DISABLE_NOTIFICATION_ICONS
Flag for disable(int) to hide notification icons and ticker text.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DISABLE_NOTIFICATION_ALERTS

public static final int DISABLE_NOTIFICATION_ALERTS
Flag for disable(int) to disable incoming notification alerts. This will not block icons, but it will block sound, vibrating and other visual or aural notifications.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DISABLE_NONE

public static final int DISABLE_NONE
Re-enable all of the status bar features that you've disabled.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

StatusBarManager

StatusBarManager(Context context)
Method Detail

disable

public void disable(int what)
Disable some features in the status bar. Pass the bitwise-or of the DISABLE_* flags. To re-enable everything, pass DISABLE_NONE.

expand

public void expand()
Expand the status bar.

collapse

public void collapse()
Collapse the status bar.

toggle

public void toggle()
Toggle the status bar.
